Uses of Interface
moulton.scalable.clickables.TouchResponsiveComponent

Packages that use TouchResponsiveComponent
Package Description
moulton.scalable.clickables
The clickables package contains classes that pertain to menu components that can be clicked.
moulton.scalable.containers
The containers package contains classes that are intended for holding menu components, especially panel classes which serve as nodes in the menu rendering tree structure.
moulton.scalable.draggables
The draggables package contains clickable subclasses that are intended to be dragged or scrolled.
moulton.scalable.geometrics
The geometrics package contains classes pertaining to primarily to aesthetics, such as lines and polygons.
moulton.scalable.popups
The popups package contains the Popup class, from which all pop ups derive, as well as implementations of two common pop up usages- a notification pop up and a confirmation pop up.
moulton.scalable.texts
The texts package contains classes and menu components that ar primarily dedicated to holding and processing text for display in the menu.
moulton.scalable.visuals
The visuals package contains classes that relate to images and animations.

  • Uses of TouchResponsiveComponent in moulton.scalable.clickables

    Classes in moulton.scalable.clickables that implement TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Button
    A menu component that is a simple rectangular button with optional frontal text saved as Button.text.
    class  Clickable
    Ancestor class for components that are clickable.
    class  RadioButton
    A button where only one in the group can be clicked at a time.

  • Uses of TouchResponsiveComponent in moulton.scalable.containers

    Fields in moulton.scalable.containers with type parameters of type TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.LinkedList<TouchResponsiveComponent> MenuManager.touchCheckList
    All of the components that the menu needs to check if touched every time the mouse moves
    Methods in moulton.scalable.containers with parameters of type TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void MenuManager.addTouchResponsiveComponent​(TouchResponsiveComponent comp)
    Adds the component to the list of components to check each time the mouse moves.
    void MenuManager.removeTouchResponsiveComponent​(TouchResponsiveComponent comp)
    Removes the specified component from the touch component list.

  • Uses of TouchResponsiveComponent in moulton.scalable.draggables

    Classes in moulton.scalable.draggables that implement TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ScrollBar
    The scroll bar class is a Draggable component that handles mouse draggging and notifies a component to be scrolled.

  • Uses of TouchResponsiveComponent in moulton.scalable.geometrics

    Classes in moulton.scalable.geometrics that implement TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  PolygonalButton
    A menu component button in the shape of a polygon as opposed to a rectangle

  • Uses of TouchResponsiveComponent in moulton.scalable.popups

    Fields in moulton.scalable.popups with type parameters of type TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.LinkedList<TouchResponsiveComponent> Popup.touchCheckList
    All of the components that need to be check if touched when the mouse moves
    Methods in moulton.scalable.popups that return types with arguments of type TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.LinkedList<TouchResponsiveComponent> Popup.getTouchCheckList()
    Returns the list of components that the MenuManager should check for selection each time the mouse moves.
    Methods in moulton.scalable.popups with parameters of type TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Popup.addTouchResponsiveComponent​(TouchResponsiveComponent comp)
    Adds the component to the list of components to check each time the mouse moves.
    void Popup.removeTouchResponsiveComponent​(TouchResponsiveComponent comp)
    Removes the specified component from the touch component list.

  • Uses of TouchResponsiveComponent in moulton.scalable.texts

    Classes in moulton.scalable.texts that implement TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  StaticTextBox
    In some instances, the user will find it useful to select and/or copy text from a text box, but should not be able to edit its values.
    class  TextBox
    This is a text box that users can enter data into, the available characters for which is defined by TextFormat.

  • Uses of TouchResponsiveComponent in moulton.scalable.visuals

    Classes in moulton.scalable.visuals that implement TouchResponsiveComponent
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AnimatedButton
    A button that displays an Animation on its button face.
    class  ImageButton
    A button that displays an image instead of text on its button face.
